IX.i.3.C.4.c
.
Considering Unemployment and Sickness Insurance From the RRB When Determining Entitlement to Pension
Unemployment and sickness insurance are based on earnings, but no contribution is made by the employee.Â  The entire amount is considered income for the purpose of determining entitlement to pension.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Pension Income Development
citation: Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
